doc.after: Nigerian citizens have authored many influential works of post colonial literature in the English language Nigeria s best known writers are Wole Soyinka the first African Nobel Laureate in Literature and Chinua Achebe best known for the novel Things Fall Apart and his controversial critique of Joseph Conrad
